Roar Cycles

Course Project | Web

Client

Roar Cycles is a manufacturer of small run, contemporary bicycles sold exclusively from their own website. Roar Bikes currently have 3 models of bike to purchase (Siamese, Sphynx, Bengal)

Primary objectives

To build a e-commerce website for people to browse & purchase bicycles for home delivery

Description

I wanted to do something different with this one and went with a very light, yet colourful palette and more eye-catching graphics/sections. The goal was to have a high density of content, both on the home page and the product page.

Product page with customer photos

Comming Soon!

Hindsight

There are definitely things that I would've/will do differently, but since this project is still on-going I have time to correct certain mistakes that I've made. The goal is to never stop learning and to constantly look at not only what you can improve, but how you can improve them

Thank you

Thanks for making it to the end! If you want more information, or have a question about anything, please feel free to head to the contact page or check out any of my social media links below.
